statements: SELECT * FROM financial_calculators;
SELECT id, calculator_name FROM financial_calculators WHERE data_source = 'API';
SELECT calculator_name, description FROM financial_calculators WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM financial_calculators WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, calculator_name, data_source FROM financial_calculators ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_calculators ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT calculator_name, description FROM financial_calculators WHERE data_source = 'API' ORDER BY calculator_name ASC
SELECT id, calculator_name, created_at FROM financial_calculators WHERE description LIKE '%interest%' LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT data_source FROM financial_calculators
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_calculators FROM financial_calculators
SELECT * FROM financial_calculators;
SELECT calculator_name, last_updated FROM financial_calculators ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT calculator_id, calculation_formula FROM financial_calculators WHERE calculator_name = 'Mortgage';
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE data_source = 'Stocks' AND data_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM financial_calculators WHERE calculation_formula LIKE '%profit%' ORDER BY calculator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_calculators WHERE calculator_name = 'Mortgage Calculator';
SELECT calculator_name, last_updated FROM financial_calculators WHERE last_updated > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT calculator_name, calculation_formula FROM financial_calculators WHERE calculation_formula LIKE '%interest%' ORDER BY calculator_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE data_value > 1000 ORDER BY data_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT data_source, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM real_time_data GROUP BY data_source HAVING total_value > 5000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT id, calculator_name, calculation_type FROM FinancialCalculator;
SELECT * FROM UserData WHERE user_role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserData ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_calculations FROM FinancialData GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_calculations DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialCalculator;
SELECT calculator_name, calculation_type FROM FinancialCalculator WHERE calculation_type = 'mortgage';
SELECT id, user_id, input_data FROM FinancialData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM UserData WHERE user_role = 'admin' AND last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE result_data->>'total' > '10000';
SELECT * FROM financial_calculator_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM financial_calculator_assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_calculator_liabilities ORDER BY liability_value DESC;
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM financial_calculator_income GROUP BY income_source;
SELECT expense_category, expense_amount FROM financial_calculator_expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM financial_calculator_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM financial_calculator_assets WHERE asset_value > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM financial_calculator_income;
SELECT income_source, SUM(income_amount) AS total_income FROM financial_calculator_income GROUP BY income_source;
SELECT * FROM financial_calculator_assets WHERE asset_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT * FROM CalculatorUser;
SELECT username, email FROM CalculatorUser WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, calculation_date, calculation_details FROM CalculatorHistory ORDER BY calculation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme, currency, language FROM CalculatorSettings WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT symbol, price, last_updated FROM FinancialData WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM CalculatorUser WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM CalculatorUser WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT u.username, c.theme FROM CalculatorUser u JOIN CalculatorSettings c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(f.favorite_id) AS num_favorites FROM CalculatorUser u LEFT JOIN UserFavorites f ON u.user_id = f.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, h.calculation_date, h.calculation_details FROM CalculatorUser u JOIN CalculatorHistory h ON u.user_id = h.user_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'a%';
